blogPost.excerpt: Create compelling video ads and marketing videos in the palm of your hand. Produce top-quality content designed specifically for business within minutes, even if you’ve never made a video before.
blogPost.body: Create compelling video ads and marketing videos in the palm of your hand. Produce top-quality content designed specifically for business within minutes, even if you’ve never made a video before.
blogPost.title: AdDirector - Make marketing videos in minutes on your phone
blogPost.author: kevin chang

localize.description: 在您的手掌中创建引人注目的视频广告和营销视频。即使您从未制作过视频，也能在几分钟内制作出专门为企业设计的高质量内容。
localize.tagline: 在手机上几分钟内制作营销视频

localize.description: 在您的手掌中創建引人注目的視頻廣告和營銷視頻。即使您從未製作過視頻，也能在幾分鐘內製作出專門爲企業設計的高質量內容。
localize.tagline: 在手機上幾分鐘內製作營銷視頻

previous.excerpt: Trainn helps SaaS companies accelerate product adoption with product walkthrough videos and training academies for users. With better product education leads to better onboarding and decreases time to value of your product leading to higher retention.
previous.title: Trainn - A new way to create professional product walkthrough videos.

localize.description: Trainn帮助SaaS公司通过产品演练视频和用户培训学院来加速产品的应用。通过更好的产品教育，使用户更好地入职，减少产品价值的时间，从而提高用户的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一种全新的方式来制作专业的产品演练视频。

localize.description: Trainn幫助SaaS公司通過產品演練視頻和用戶培訓學院來加速產品的應用。通過更好的產品教育，使用戶更好地入職，減少產品價值的時間，從而提高用戶的留存率。
localize.tagline: 一種全新的方式來製作專業的產品演練視頻。

next.excerpt: Agree is a shared voting app to help you come to a joint decision with friends and colleagues. Create and share polls, and simply swipe right to vote yes and left for no. Winning options pop up as a notification once everyone has voted.
next.title: Agree - Polls with friends

localize.description: Agree是一款共享投票应用，帮助你与朋友和同事达成共同的决定。创建和分享投票，只需向右滑动投赞成票，向左滑动投反对票。一旦大家都投了票，获胜的选项就会以通知的形式弹出。
Agree是一款共享投票應用，幫助你與朋友和同事達成共同的決定。創建和分享投票，只需向右滑動投贊成票，向左滑動投反對票。一旦大家都投了票，獲勝的選項就會以通知的形式彈出。
